title: Error in mlflow experiments delete
body:
### System information
- Linux Ubuntu 16.04
- MLflow installed with pip from latest s3 wheel (mlflow-0.7.1.dev-253.8ccc546-py2.py3-none-any.whl) 
- **MLflow version**: 0.7.1.dev
- **Python version**: 3.6.5
- **Exact command to reproduce**: mlflow experiments delete "existent experiment id"

### Describe the problem
Command fails. It should not.

:~$ mlflow experiments delete 3

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/areshytko/anaconda3/bin/mlflow", line 11, in <module>
    sys.exit(cli())
  File "/home/areshytko/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/click/core.py", line 764, in __call__
    return self.main(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/home/areshytko/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/click/core.py", line 717, in main
    rv = self.invoke(ctx)
  File "/home/areshytko/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/click/core.py", line 1137, in invoke
    return _process_result(sub_ctx.command.invoke(sub_ctx))
  File "/home/areshytko/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/click/core.py", line 1137, in invoke
    return _process_result(sub_ctx.command.invoke(sub_ctx))
  File "/home/areshytko/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/click/core.py", line 956, in invoke
    return ctx.invoke(self.callback, **ctx.params)
  File "/home/areshytko/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/click/core.py", line 555, in invoke
    return callback(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/home/areshytko/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/mlflow/experiments.py", line 64, in delete_experiment
    store.delete_experiment(experiment_id)
  File "/home/areshytko/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/mlflow/store/rest_store.py", line 103, in delete_experiment
    req_body = message_to_json(DeleteExperiment(experiment_id=experiment_id))
TypeError: '3' has type str, but expected one of: int, long
